title: Standard components
text: type: derivation Derives relative day compared treatment start date.

title: Standard components
text: {{variable}}

title: Standard components
code: {{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>   dplyr::mutate(     {{variable}} = admiral::compute_duration(       start_date = TRTSDT,       end_date = {{date}},       in_unit = "days",       out_unit = "days",       add_one = TRUE     )   )

title: Standard components
text: type: derivation Derives analysis end date based (incomplete) dates given character

title: Standard components
text: AENDT AENDTF

title: Standard components
code: {{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>   dplyr::mutate(     AENDT = admiral::convert_dtc_to_dt(       dtc = {{dtc}},       highest_imputation = "M",       date_imputation = "last"     ),     AENDTF = admiral::compute_dtf(       dtc = {{dtc}},       dt = AENDT     )   )

title: Standard components
text: type: assigned Assigns single value entire column.

title: Standard components
text: {{variable}}

title: Standard components
text: type: derivation Derives analysis start date based (incomplete) dates given character

title: Standard components
text: ASTDT ASTDTF

title: Standard components
code: {{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>   dplyr::mutate(     ASTDT = admiral::convert_dtc_to_dt(       dtc = {{dtc}},       highest_imputation = "M",       date_imputation = "first"     ),     ASTDTF = admiral::compute_dtf(       dtc = {{dtc}},       dt = ASTDT     )   )

title: Standard components
text: type: predecessor Creates new column(s) based predecessor column(s).

what: supp_sdtm: Add Supplementary Variable from SDTM
title: Standard components
text: type: predecessor Add variable supplementary SDTM domain.

previous_headings: supp_sdtm: Add Supplementary Variable from SDTM
title: Standard components

previous_headings: supp_sdtm: Add Supplementary Variable from SDTM
title: Standard components
code: idvar <- unique({{source}}[["IDVAR"]]) idclass <- class({{domain}}[[idvar]]) idfunc <- get(paste0("as.", idclass))  supp_data <- {{source}} |>   dplyr::select(USUBJID, IDVAR, IDVARVAL, QNAM, QVAL) |>   tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = QNAM, values_from = QVAL) |>   dplyr::mutate(IDVARVAL = idfunc(IDVARVAL)) |>   dplyr::select(USUBJID, IDVARVAL, {{qnam}})  {{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>   dplyr::left_join(     y = supp_data,     by = dplyr::join_by(USUBJID, !!idvar == IDVARVAL)   )

title: Standard components
text: type: derivation Derives treatment emergent analysis flag.

title: Standard components
text: TRTEMFL

title: Standard components
code: {{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>   admiral::derive_var_trtemfl(     start_date = ASTDT,     end_date = AENDT,     trt_start_date = TRTSDT,     trt_end_date = TRTEDT,     end_window = {{end_window}}   )

title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {mighty.component: Standard components for ADaM generation},   author = {Aksel Thomsen and Matthew Phelps},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9013},   url = {https://NovoNordisk-OpenSource.github.io/mighty.component}, }

title: Standard components for ADaM generation
text: mighty.component serve repository generic compute component classes used produce ADaM scripts {mighty} framework.

title: Standard components for ADaM generation
text: can install development version mighty.component GitHub :

title: Standard components for ADaM generation
text: mighty.component provide generic classes work standard components, helper functions retrieve . now also holds small temporary library components. See vignette("mighty-standards") work standard components.

title: Retrieve mighty code component — get_component
text: Retrieve mighty code component, supporting built-standards custom components local files. get_component(): Returns object class mighty_component containing standard custom component. get_rendered_component(): Returns object class mighty_component_rendered containing rendered code component rendering component required list parameters depends individual component. Check documentation specific standard, local component, details.

title: Retrieve mighty code component — get_component
text: component character specifying either standard component name path custom component file (R Mustache template). params named list input parameters. Passed along mighty_component$render().

title: Retrieve mighty code component — get_component
text: Processes different component types based file extension component name: extension: Looks built-standard components name. .R: Extracts renders custom functions. .mustache: Creates components template files.

title: Retrieve mighty code component — get_component
code: get_component("ady") #> <mighty_component/R6> #> ady: Derives the relative day compared to the treatment start date. #> Type: derivation #> Parameters: #> • domain: `character` Name of new domain being created #> • variable: `character` Name of new variable to create #> • date: `character` Name of date variable to use #> Depends: #> • {{domain}}.{{date}} #> • {{domain}}.TRTSDT #> Outputs: #> • {{variable}}  get_rendered_component("ady", list(domain = "advs", variable = "ASTDY", date = "ASTDT")) #> <mighty_component_rendered/mighty_component/R6> #> ady: Derives the relative day compared to the treatment start date. #> Type: derivation #> Depends: #> • advs.ASTDT #> • advs.TRTSDT #> Outputs: #> • ASTDY #> Code: #> advs <- advs |> #>   dplyr::mutate( #>     ASTDY = admiral::compute_duration( #>       start_date = TRTSDT, #>       end_date = ASTDT, #>       in_unit = "days", #>       out_unit = "days", #>       add_one = TRUE #>     ) #>   )

title: Retrieve mighty standard component — get_standard
text: Retrieve either generalized standard component (template) rendered standard component code ready use. get_standard(): Returns object class mighty_component get_rendered_standard(): Returns object class mighty_component_rendered rendering standard required list parameters depends standard. Check documentation specific standard details.

title: Retrieve mighty standard component — get_standard
text: standard character name standard component retrieve. params named list input parameters. Passed along mighty_component$render().

title: Retrieve mighty standard component — get_standard
code: get_standard("ady") #> <mighty_component/R6> #> ady: Derives the relative day compared to the treatment start date. #> Type: derivation #> Parameters: #> • domain: `character` Name of new domain being created #> • variable: `character` Name of new variable to create #> • date: `character` Name of date variable to use #> Depends: #> • {{domain}}.{{date}} #> • {{domain}}.TRTSDT #> Outputs: #> • {{variable}}  get_rendered_standard("ady", list(domain = "advs", variable = "ASTDY", date = "ASTDT")) #> <mighty_component_rendered/mighty_component/R6> #> ady: Derives the relative day compared to the treatment start date. #> Type: derivation #> Depends: #> • advs.ASTDT #> • advs.TRTSDT #> Outputs: #> • ASTDY #> Code: #> advs <- advs |> #>   dplyr::mutate( #>     ASTDY = admiral::compute_duration( #>       start_date = TRTSDT, #>       end_date = ASTDT, #>       in_unit = "days", #>       out_unit = "days", #>       add_one = TRUE #>     ) #>   )

title: List all available standards — list_standards
text: List available mighty standard components.

title: List all available standards — list_standards
text: Format list standards . Default character just lists names, list tibble show detailed information.

title: List all available standards — list_standards
text: character vector standard names

title: List all available standards — list_standards
code: # Simple character list of all standard ids: list_standards() #> [1] "ady"         "aendt"       "assign"      "astdt"       "predecessor" #> [6] "supp_sdtm"   "trtemfl"      # Tibble for an easy overview list_standards(as = "tibble") #> # A tibble: 7 × 7 #>   id          title                     description params depends outputs code  #>   <chr>       <chr>                     <chr>       <list> <list>  <list>  <lis> #> 1 ady         Analysis relative day     Derives th… <df>   <df>    <chr>   <chr> #> 2 aendt       Analysis end date         Derives an… <df>   <df>    <chr>   <chr> #> 3 assign      Assign                    Assigns a … <df>   <NULL>  <chr>   <chr> #> 4 astdt       Analysis start date       Derives an… <df>   <df>    <chr>   <chr> #> 5 predecessor Predecessor               Creates ne… <df>   <df>    <chr>   <chr> #> 6 supp_sdtm   Add Supplementary Variab… Add a vari… <df>   <df>    <chr>   <chr> #> 7 trtemfl     Treatment-emergent flag   Derives tr… <df>   <df>    <chr>   <chr>  # List (only showing first 2): list_standards(as = "list") |>   head(2) |>   str() #> List of 2 #>  $ :List of 7 #>   ..$ id         : chr "ady" #>   ..$ title      : chr "Analysis relative day" #>   ..$ description: chr "Derives the relative day compared to the treatment start date." #>   ..$ params     :'data.frame':	3 obs. of  2 variables: #>   .. ..$ name       : chr [1:3] "domain" "variable" "date" #>   .. ..$ description: chr [1:3] "`character` Name of new domain being created" "`character` Name of new variable to create" "`character` Name of date variable to use" #>   ..$ depends    :'data.frame':	2 obs. of  2 variables: #>   .. ..$ domain: chr [1:2] "{{domain}}" "{{domain}}" #>   .. ..$ column: chr [1:2] "{{date}}" "TRTSDT" #>   ..$ outputs    : chr "{{variable}}" #>   ..$ code       : chr [1:10] "{{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>" "  dplyr::mutate(" "    {{variable}} = admiral::compute_duration(" "      start_date = TRTSDT," ... #>  $ :List of 7 #>   ..$ id         : chr "aendt" #>   ..$ title      : chr "Analysis end date" #>   ..$ description: chr "Derives analysis end date based on (incomplete) dates given as character" #>   ..$ params     :'data.frame':	2 obs. of  2 variables: #>   .. ..$ name       : chr [1:2] "domain" "dtc" #>   .. ..$ description: chr [1:2] "`character` Name of new domain being created" "`character` Name of date variable" #>   ..$ depends    :'data.frame':	1 obs. of  2 variables: #>   .. ..$ domain: chr "{{domain}}" #>   .. ..$ column: chr "{{dtc}}" #>   ..$ outputs    : chr [1:2] "AENDT" "AENDTF" #>   ..$ code       : chr [1:12] "{{domain}} <- {{domain}} |>" "  dplyr::mutate(" "    AENDT = admiral::convert_dtc_to_dt(" "      dtc = {{dtc}}," ...

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: Class generic mighty standard component. mighty framework, "component" code template processes input data returns modified version new columns rows. Standard components share common structure roxygen-like documentation pattern, facilitating use inside mighty.

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: Templates character vectors R code interpreted. Dynamic use variables etc. supported using mustache framework. Dynamic parameters specified using {{ variable_name }}.

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: template required documented following tags similar documenting functions using roxygen2:

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: template standard components follow conventions: input data set always called .self. Additional parameters used render template R code documented @param tag. template ends creating modified version .self. Template documented roxygen-like tags

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: example mighty component template creates new dynamic variable variable twice value dynamic input x, already input data set .self.   rendered parameters variable = "" x = "B" rendered code used mighty becomes:
code: #' @title Title for my component #' @description #' A more in depth description of what is being done #' #' @param variable dynamic output if applicable #' @param x some other input to the component #' @type derivation #' @depends .self {{ x }} #' @outputs {{ variable }} #' @code .self <- .self |>   dplyr::mutate(     {{ variable }} = 2 * {{ x }}   ) .self <- .self |>   dplyr::mutate(     A = 2 * B   )

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: id Component ID title Title component. description Description component. code code block component. template complete template. type type component. Can one predecessor, derivation, row. depends Data.frame listing components dependencies. outputs List new columns created component. params Data.frame listing parameters need supplied rendering component.

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: mighty_component$new() mighty_component$print() mighty_component$render() mighty_component$document() mighty_component$clone()
